subject: How to - Test Case for an Abstract class / Inteface ?
msgSnippet: Hi Groups There is an abstract class,  which implements an interface. I want to write a test cases for these abstract class. Do I need to write and factory
messageBody:
Hi Groups

There is an abstract class, which implements an interface.
I want to write a test cases for these abstract class.
Do I need to write and factory class for that? any Idea?
Any the better solution?

Thanks in advance
kannan
